text: Alexandra Pomales (born July 4, 1995 United States), is an American actress. Actress And TV Host - She is known internationally for participating in various telenovelas of Telemundo and Nickelodeon (Latin America) In 2014, she participated in the ABC TV series Killer Women as a series regular and was host of her own show called Turn IT On back in 2013 .
